Paper.Title: IBM MASTOR SYSTEM: Multilingual Automatic Speech-to-speech Translator *

Section.Paragraph: Yuqing Gao, Liang Gu, Bowen Zhou, Ruhi Sarikaya, Mohamed Afify, Hong-Kwang Kuo, Wei-zhong Zhu, Yonggang Deng, Charles Prosser, Wei Zhang and Laurent Besacier IBM T. J. Watson Research Center, Yorktown Heights, NY 10598
